title: Hundreds of Sri Lankans converge in front of USA Embassy in London
content: Onlanka News – Press Release by Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Nimal Navaratne) Hundreds of peace loving Sri Lankan expatriates converged outside the American Embassy in London on Sunday 11 March to protest against the United States sponsored resolution on Sri Lanka at the ongoing United Nations Human Rights Council (UNHRC) in Geneva….
